item.title: Follow live: Joe Burrow returns as Bengals face Ravens
Questions, takeaways from Thanksgiving matchups: Our reporters break down every game
item.description: Our NFL Nation reporters answer big questions from each Week 13 game, starting with Thanksgiving Day matchups.

item.title: Thanksgiving Love: Pack QB tosses 4 TDs in win
item.description: The Packers feasted once again on Thanksgiving, with QB Jordan Love tossing four touchdown passes in a 31-24 win over the Lions.

item.title: OKC's Williams off injury report; to debut Friday
item.description: Thunder All-NBA guard Jalen Williams is set to make his season debut against the Suns on Friday.

item.title: Campbell: Lions in 'little bit of a hole' after loss
item.description: Even coach Dan Campbell could admit after the Lions' 31-24 Thanksgiving Day loss to the Packers, that "we've dug ourselves a little bit of a hole" at ...
